snippet.title: Heart Forth, Alicia - #3 Gameplay Combat & Exploration
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam - https://bit.ly/3nPagdH    |   http://twitter.com/HFAgame   |  
Become a Backer & play the demo: http://hfalicia.com/paypal/ 
Press Kit: http://bit.ly/hfapkit   |   Kickstarter- http://kck.st/Rod8PX 

Alicia searches for her lost friend in the Verillion Trail, at the East side of Ëliadin.

Heart Forth, Alicia is a '90s-inspired game about a young wizard pursued by a terror in the sky. 

This Metroidvania RPG offers a modern take on a beloved genre, combining the tight gameplay from the classic action platformers with an epic and serious narrative akin to the iconic '90s RPGs. Coming to PC, PS4, PS Vita and Wii U in 2017.

This is an uninterrupted Alpha gameplay video. Contents might be subject to change in the final game.
